wikipedia_page.main: Simon Hayes is a British sound engineer and Brazilian jiu-jitsu coach. He won an Academy Award for Best Sound at the 85th Academy Awards for his work on Les Misérables. He has worked on more than 50 films since 1995. Hayes is a 3rd Degree Brazilian jiu-jitsu black belt under Wilson Junior.
